assessment_item.title: ವಿಪ್ರೋ ತಂತ್ರಜ್ಞಾನ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯ ಅಧ್ಯಕ್ಷರು
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ವಿಪ್ರೋ ತಂತ್ರಜ್ಞಾನ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯ ಅಧ್ಯಕ್ಷರು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಧೀರು ಭಾಯಿ ಅಂಬಾನಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4966"},{"text":"

ನಾರಾಯಣ ಮೂರ್ತಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4967"},{"text":"

ಕಿರಣ್ ಮುಜಮ್‍ದಾರ್ ಷಾ  

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4977"},{"text":"

 ಅಜೀಂ ಪ್ರೇಮ್‍ಜಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4982"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ವಿಪ್ರೋ ತಂತ್ರಜ್ಞಾನ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯ ಅಧ್ಯಕ್ಷರು ","title":"ವಿಪ್ರೋ ತಂತ್ರಜ್ಞಾನ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯ ಅಧ್ಯಕ್ಷರು ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Social Studies","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
